function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential invasion of privacy due to constant surveillance by pandemic drones","Impact":"Loss of personal freedom and increased anxiety among the public","Mitigation":"Regulation of drone usage and clear guidelines on data collection and privacy protection","Technologies":"Encryption and secure data transmission technologies for data collected","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Hazardous exposure to disinfectant chemicals due to drone spraying","Impact":"Health risks and environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Use of environmentally friendly disinfectants and careful monitoring of spraying activities","Technologies":"Environmental sensors to monitor chemical dispersal and biodegradable disinfectants","People":"Frontline workers and general public","Owner":"Health authorities and environmental protection agencies"},{"Description":"Risk of technological failure leading to delay in delivery of medical supplies","Impact":"Delayed access to critical medical supplies in remote areas","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and testing of drone technology, backup delivery systems","Technologies":"Advanced drone navigation systems and redundant communication systems","People":"Patients in remote areas","Owner":"Healthcare providers and research institutions"}]}
